Package io.libraft.agent.configuration

Configuration blocks, properties and utilities for RaftAgent.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Endpoints Provides static utility methods for converting string endpoints (i.e.
RaftClusterConfiguration Represents the configuration of a Raft cluster.
RaftConfiguration Represents the top-level configuration for libraft-agent.
RaftConfigurationLoader Provides static utility methods for constructing and validating RaftConfiguration instances.
RaftDatabaseConfiguration Represents the configuration for the database backend to be used as the persistent store for Log and Store.
RaftMemberConverter Provides Jackson JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer implementations that convert a RaftMember to/from its JSON representation.
RaftMemberConverter.Deserializer JsonDeserializer implementation that converts a JSON object into a corresponding RaftMember instance.
RaftMemberConverter.Serializer JsonSerializer implementation that converts a RaftMember instance into its corresponding JSON representation.
 

Exception Summary
RaftConfigurationException Thrown when a RaftAgent configuration block or property fails basic validation.
 

Package io.libraft.agent.configuration Description

Configuration blocks, properties and utilities for RaftAgent.
